r.s: Driver based class to calculate holidays.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculate the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. The calculation is driver-based so it is easy to add new drivers that calculate a country's holidays. The methods of the class can be used to get a holiday's date and title in various languages.
r.n: * Fix Bug #10221: Easier language selection [kguest] * Fix Bug #14638: Improper use of function_exists() [kguest] * Fix Bug #15046: Avoid arbitrary file inclusion. [kguest] * Fix Bug #15079: fix use of easter_days function [kguest] * Fix Bug #15360: Double error in Christian.php [doconnor] * Fix Bug #15676: Date_Holidays_EnglandWalse [kguest]
